Author: indie01
Content:
Actually, I doubt they'll be hiring any journalists any time soon. They're going under:

http://news.wired.com/dynamic/stories/M/MAGAZINE_CLOSURE?SIT...

Too bad, since I think they're one of the best business-tech magazines on the market. I just barely renewed my subscription, too. Bummer.

Title: 101 dumbest moments in business

Author: prime0196
Content: Success is defined by the goals you set for your startup.  Some people may create a startup in hopes to match their current salary at their "real job", so that they can quit. Once that goal is attained they consider their venture a success.  Others have higher, loftier goals (go IPO) and if they don't achieve that goal then they feel that were unsuccessful and thus continue creating/joining other startups and ventures until that goal is reached. One man's failure is another man's success.

Author: rms
Content: I assume 24/7 Wi-fi iTunes/anywhere.fm streaming would get you kicked off of an unlimited data plan. We need to know exactly how much bandwidth you are really allowed before the sweet spot for hybrid caching/streaming system can be determined
